item.content:encoded:
There’s no denying that content marketing can be challenging. And we know the backbone of every content marketing strategy is blogging.

Wondering how to start a blog?

The question on every business owner’s mind should in fact be: how to write a blog that ranks. 

Because sure, you can shell out content every day or so—generic, 200-words blogs with no focus and zero keywords. They’re not going to add value; they’re not going to solve your target audiences’ questions; they won’t augment your brand; and they’re not going to rank.

If you’re going to invest time in a blogging strategy, it doesn’t matter what industry you’re in; you need to know how to write a good blog, how to structure a blog post, the ideal word count for a blog, and how to drive traffic to your blog!

These are key elements.

In this infographic, our blog experts talk about some tips for writing successful blogs.
